ðŸ“– Summary: Finicky is a macOS application that acts as a default browser, allowing users to define rules to route URLs to specific browsers based on matching criteria. It offers features like URL rewriting, JavaScript/TypeScript configuration, and handling multiple browsers, enhancing workflow organization by separating browsing contexts.
